document_data.name: Mosque of Kossuth
document_data.location: [[City of Brass]], the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]]
document_data.source: [[Secrets of the Lamp|Secrets of the Lamp, Genie Lore]]
document_data.Description: This mosque was made from beaten [[bronze]].
document_data.Activities: Since the [[efreet]] had discouraged the worship of Kossuth since the mosque's erection, the building had fallen into a state of disrepair. However, the efreet would never dare destroy the mosque for fear of angering the [[primordial]].
